item.title: CVE-2019-10618|2024-08-04T22:31:59.929Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20connectivity
item.description: Driver may access an invalid address while processing IO control due to lack of check of address validation in Snapdragon Connectivity in QCA6390
